com.adobe.aem.commons.assetshare.search

Interface Search


  • @ProviderType
public interface Search

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFormId()
      The ID of the form.
      String getLayout()
      This is used to expose state around what layout-type was requested for this search.
      String getMode()
      This is used to expose state around what mode was requested for this search.
      Results getResults() 

    • Method Detail

      • getFormId

        String getFormId()
        The ID of the form. This is used to associate results w a particular form. As of Asset Share Commons 1.0.0, only 1 "search" is allowed on the page so this value is not well used.
        Returns:
        the form's id.

      • getLayout

        String getLayout()
        This is used to expose state around what layout-type was requested for this search. This makes consumers (HTL) of Search results able to easily make decisions about how to render the search results.
        Returns:
        the layout for the search.

      • getMode

        String getMode()
        This is used to expose state around what mode was requested for this search. The mode typically is used to engage a specific SearchProvider, however this is not mandatory. In the initial release of Asset Share Commons, the only supported mode is "search".
        Returns:
        the search model.

      • getResults

        Results getResults()
        Returns:
        the Results object, that represents the results of the search. Results contains a list of all results as well as heuristics and other metadata about the search.
